lead_paragraph: Long championed as a lifeline for poor black children, the schools have recently been denounced by two civil rights organizations, which called for a moratorium on charters.

headline.print_headline: Condemnation of Charter Schools Exposes a Rift Among Black Americans
headline.main: Condemnation of Charter Schools Exposes a Rift Over Black Students

snippet: Long championed as a lifeline for poor black children, the schools have recently been denounced by two civil rights organizations, which called for a moratorium on charters....
abstract: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People and Movement for Black Lives have separately passed resolutions calling for national moratorium on charter schools, which they say exacerbate segregation; black leaders from organizations supporting charter schools argue against moratorium, saying desire for integration cannot outweigh urgency of giving nation's poorest students alternative to underperforming public schools.
